name: Seamless (BLANKdev)
description:
A platformer where you need to use timing, agility and most importantly... box linking? Use buttons and your wall jumping skills to reach the coil of wires at the end. 

Controls:

You can move inside of any orange section that is 'Joined Together' with the one you are currently in, be careful, this isn't always a good thing!

  • Movement: WASD
  • Jump: Space

Leaderboard:

  1. Send us your time on discord: https://discord.gg/3EpsH8nqst if you think you have the best time!

Credits:

Level Design: EmInSpace - https://www.youtube.com/c/EmInSpace

Submitted to the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theme: Joined Together
